item.title: Please need help for my website
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

Simple.
I donâ€™t know what you mean by clickable, but on the below script, when you click it opens the image source.
Fill out the form.

<table width="document.getElementById('IARCOOL').width"  height="document.getElementById('IARCOOL').height">
<tr width="document.getElementById('IARCOOL').width"  height="document.getElementById('IARCOOL').height">
<td width="document.getElementById('IARCOOL').width"  height="document.getElementById('IARCOOL').height">
<img id="IARCOOL" src="URL TO IMAGE HERE" height="HEIGHT OF IMAGE" width="WIDTH OF IMAGE" onclick="window.open('this.src')">
</td>
</tr>
</table>
